name: $first
desc: the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).

name: $share
desc: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more than one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.

name: $last
desc: re-use the first item in the list, and keep adding content to it.
